tool_description: Analyzes document structure to identify sections, headers, paragraphs, and hierarchical organization for better content understanding.

document_text.description: Full text content of the document to analyze

detect_headers.description: Whether to identify section headers and titles

detect_lists.description: Whether to identify bulleted and numbered lists

min_section_length.description: Minimum character count for section identification

language.description: Document language for better structural analysis

error_messages: Empty document: The document_text parameter cannot be empty.
Document too short: Document must contain at least 10 characters for analysis.
Unsupported language: The specified language is not supported for structural analysis.
Invalid section length: min_section_length must be between 10 and 1000 characters.
usage: Provide document_text and configure structure detection options. Returns hierarchical structure information and content organization.

section_count.description: Number of sections identified in the document

list_count.description: Number of lists found in the document

structure_summary.description: Brief summary of document structure and organization
